name: mcp-web-search
description: Provides DuckDuckGo-backed web search and page fetching tools for Codex MCP.

tools.name: web_search.query
tools.description: Execute a DuckDuckGo web search and return highlights plus top page previews.

max_results.description: Maximum number of search results to return.

agent_id.description: Identifier used for rate limiting context. Defaults to 'mcp'.

tools.name: web_search.fetch_page
tools.description: Fetch the full HTML and text content of a given URL using the crawler.
